lead_paragraph: French prosecutors confirmed they have widened their investigation into corruption in athletics to include bidding for the 2016 and 2020 Olympics.

headline.print_headline: French Prosecutors Investigating 2016 and 2020 Olympic Bids
headline.main: French Prosecutors Investigating 2016 and 2020 Olympic Bids
